main.java.latexee.docast

Class ParsedStatement

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.latexee.docast.ParsedStatement
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeclareStatement, FormulaStatement, IncludeStatement, LemmaStatement, ProofStatement, TheoremStatement

    public class ParsedStatement
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class for the statements, which are extracted from the document. All other statement classes (FormulaStatement, IncludeStatement, ...) are extended from this class. Contains fields for content string, start location of the statement and recursive data structure for statements which are children of a statement (formula in a lemma and lemma can be in a proof).

        public ParsedStatement(java.lang.String content,
                       int characterLocation,
                       java.util.ArrayList<ParsedStatement> children)

        Parameters:
        content - string content of the statement
        characterLocation - starting location of the statement
        children - List of statements, which are children of the instance of ParsedStatement.
